mapper.select: SELECT cardid, typename, xgocoin, starttime, endtime, yield, commentstartdays, watchdays, minprice, maxprice, (maxprice - minprice) as spread, STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d '),starttime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as selltime, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d '),starttime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ,STR_TO_DATE(#{calctime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')) as minutenum from c_t_app_membercard am where forder = #{forder} limit 1

SELECT ar.userid,ar.cardid,am.starttime,al.levelenum, al.interesttimes,au.nickname,au.phone from c_t_app_rushtobuy ar left join c_t_app_membercard am on ar.cardid = am.cardid left join c_t_app_userinfo au on ar.userid = au.userid left join c_t_app_memberlevel al on au.levelid = al.levelid where TO_DAYS(ar.createtime) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) and ar.status = 1 and am.forder = #{forder}

select ao.orderid, ao.selluserid,ao.cardprice,au.nickname,au.phone from c_t_app_order ao left join c_t_app_userinfo au on ao.selluserid = au.userid left join c_t_app_membercard am on ao.cardid = am.cardid where am.forder = #{forder} and ao.status = 0 order by ao.createtime
